Package view

Class DoctorView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.DoctorView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDisplayMenu
    public class DoctorView
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDisplayMenu
    The DoctorView class provides an interface for doctors to interact with the Hospital Management System (HMS). This class allows doctors to manage appointments, view and update medical records, set availability, and handle other related tasks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DoctorView​(Doctor doctor, AppointmentManager appointmentManager, DoctorAvailabilityManager doctorAvailabilityManager, MedicineManager medicineManager, UserManager userManager, java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Constructs an instance of DoctorView.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void acceptAppointmentRequestView()
      Allows the doctor to accept or decline appointment requests.
      void displayMenu()
      Displays the main menu for the doctor and handles navigation to various functionalities.
      void recordAppointmentOutcomeView()
      Records the outcome of an appointment, including services provided and consultation notes.
      void updateMedicalRecordsView()
      Updates specific medical records for a patient, such as treatments, diagnoses, or prescriptions.
      void viewMedicalRecordsView()
      Displays all medical records associated with patients managed by the doctor.
      void viewScheduleView()
      Displays the schedule of the doctor.
      void viewSetAvailabilityAppointment()
      Allows the doctor to set or update their availability for appointments.
      void viewUpcomingAppointmentView()
      Displays all upcoming appointments for the doctor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

                  java.util.Scanner scanner)
        Constructs an instance of DoctorView.
        Parameters:
        doctor - the logged-in doctor
        appointmentManager - manages appointments
        doctorAvailabilityManager - manages doctor availability
        medicineManager - manages medicine inventory
        userManager - manages user-related operations
        scanner - the scanner object for user input
